page.title: PhoneGap Cli로 디버깅하기
page.content: phonegap serve    웹으로 console.log 코딩한 내용도 터미널에서 다 나온다.        TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:webspeech_test taeseongpark$ phonegap serve    [phonegap] starting app server...    [phonegap] listening on 10.10.1.241:3000    [phonegap]     [phonegap] ctrl-c to stop the server    [phonegap]     [phonegap] [console.warn] Content Security Policy has been added: <meta http-equiv="Content-Security-Policy" content="default-src * gap: ws: https://ssl.gstatic.com;img-src * 'self' data: content:;style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data: blob:;script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob:;">    [phonegap] 200 /__api__/appzip    [phonegap] 200 /socket.io/socket.io.js    [phonegap] 200 /socket.io/?EIO=3&transport=polling&t=L-pyAfT    [phonegap] 200 /socket.io/?EIO=3&transport=polling&t=L-pyAiX&sid=KCehD428dejp77tWAAAA    [phonegap] 200 /socket.io/?EIO=3&transport=polling&t=L-pyAls&sid=KCehD428dejp77tWAAAA    [phonegap] [console.log]     [phonegap] [console.log] img src https://t1.daumcdn.net/daumtop_chanel/op/20170607102632403.png    [phonegap] [console.log] data {"requests":[{"image":{"source":{"imageUri":"https://t1.daumcdn.net/daumtop_chanel/op/20170607102632403.png"}},"features":[{"type":"TEXT_DETECTION","maxResults":3},{"type":"LOGO_DETECTION","maxResults":3},{"type":"WEB_DETECTION","maxResults":3}]}]}    [phonegap] [console.log] vision [object Object]    [phonegap] [console.log] getUserMedia supported.    [phonegap] [console.log] err [object NavigatorUserMediaError]
page.html:
phonegap serve

웹으로 console.log 코딩한 내용도 터미널에서 다 나온다.


TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:webspeech_test taeseongpark$ phonegap serve

[phonegap] starting app server...

[phonegap] listening on 10.10.1.241:3000

[phonegap]

[phonegap] ctrl-c to stop the server

[phonegap]

[phonegap] [console.warn] Content Security Policy has been added: <meta http-equiv="Content-Security-Policy" content="default-src * gap: ws: https://ssl.gstatic.com;img-src * 'self' data: content:;style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data: blob:;script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob:;">

[phonegap] 200 /__api__/appzip

[phonegap] 200 /socket.io/socket.io.js

[phonegap] 200 /socket.io/?EIO=3&transport=polling&t=L-pyAfT

[phonegap] 200 /socket.io/?EIO=3&transport=polling&t=L-pyAiX&sid=KCehD428dejp77tWAAAA

[phonegap] 200 /socket.io/?EIO=3&transport=polling&t=L-pyAls&sid=KCehD428dejp77tWAAAA

[phonegap] [console.log]

[phonegap] [console.log] img src https://t1.daumcdn.net/daumtop_chanel/op/20170607102632403.png

[phonegap] [console.log] data {"requests":[{"image":{"source":{"imageUri":"https://t1.daumcdn.net/daumtop_chanel/op/20170607102632403.png"}},"features":[{"type":"TEXT_DETECTION","maxResults":3},{"type":"LOGO_DETECTION","maxResults":3},{"type":"WEB_DETECTION","maxResults":3}]}]}

[phonegap] [console.log] vision [object Object]
